item.title: Please need help with insane pk base!
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

hey try this! dont get your hopes up im just trying to help.

Okay so first i want to know where to change stuff thats in the quest tab=)

Also i have a problem with this code command:

public boolean ownerRights(Player p) {
        String users[] = ("fr0z3n") || ("Other Name");
        for (String i : users) {
            if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

    public boolean canChangeRights(Player p) {
        String users[] = ("fr0z3n") || ("Other Name");
        for (String i : users) {
            if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
                return true;

hope this helps!

Brandon B

Read full topic

item.title: Please need help with insane pk base!
item.dc:creator: @zwylo zwylo
item.description:
@zwylo wrote:

Compiling net/com/pulsepk/*.java
.\net\com\pulsepk\net\packethandler\Commands.java:24: ‘;’ expected
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”}&& {“klutchking”};
^
.\net\com\pulsepk\net\packethandler\Commands.java:24: not a statement
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”}&& {“klutchking”};
^
.\net\com\pulsepk\net\packethandler\Commands.java:24: ‘;’ expected
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”}&& {“klutchking”};
^
Note: .\net\com\pulsepk\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Please need help with insane pk base!
item.dc:creator: @zwylo zwylo
item.description:
@zwylo wrote:

Okay so first i want to know where to change stuff thats in the quest tab=)

Also i have a problem with this code command:

public boolean ownerRights(Player p) {
String users[] = {“fr0z3n”};
for (String i : users) {
if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public boolean canChangeRights(Player p) {
    String users[] = {"fr0z3n"};
    for (String i : users) {
        if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(i)) {
            return true;

How can i add another name after my name fr0z3n correctly??? i keep getting 4errors=( someone please help=0
